memberdef.name: CFE_ES_CDSMemPoolDefSize
memberdef.initializer: = { CFE_ES_CDS_MAX_BLOCK_SIZE, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_16, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_15, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_14, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_13, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_12, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_11, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_10, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_09, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_08, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_07, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_06, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_05, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_04, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_03, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_02, CFE_ES_CDS_MEM_BLOCK_SIZE_01 }

briefdescription.para: Creates a CDS memory pool from scratch.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Creates a memory pool of the specified size starting at the specified offset into the CDS memory.
